From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> macon.morrison@gmail.com [mailto:macon.morrison@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Macon Morrison Sent: Friday, April 13, 2012 3:25 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Hi Sara, Thanks for this! Is there any way to lower the non-billables to $200 (I can walk to work) and lower the retirement match to 15% (currently at 30%)? Thanks! Macon On Fri, Apr 13, 2012 at 3:11 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Macon , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. I have also attached the estimates we created together. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
